thread.title: Security Officer - Part-Time - Sports Management

title: Security Officer - Part-Time - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: We are hiring additional part-time security officers for our 2015 football season. Security officers are responsible for ensuring the safety and security for all home games...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
